subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. banned the horse-collar tackle. It will assess a penalty this season when a runner is yanked to the ground from the inside collar of his shoulder pads or jersey. Other changes included a clarification of rules on chop blocks and implementation of a 40-second play clock that will start as soon as the ball is ruled dead.
